name: Zombie Genome Project
description:
Welcome,

If you are reading this message, it's because the human race is being plagued by an unstoppable zombie infection. It is your mission to splice genes and find a cure to the zombie infection.

This is the
Zombie Genome Project

You will be asked to match one of two possible amino acid combinations.

You may rotate the acids by tapping them and swap their places by swiping from one acid to another.

Good Luck.
